title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development 

(section 181) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall be included in the collective citation the 

Planning and Development Regulations 2001 to 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited planning development (section 181) regulation 2023 (2) regulation shall included collective citation planning development regulation 2001 2023

title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: In these Regulations “relevant period” means the period commencing
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “relevant period” means the period commencing 

on the making of these Regulations and ending on the 31 December 2023.
text_norm: 2 regulation relevant period mean period commencing making regulation ending 31 december 2023

title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: 3. The Planning and Development Act 2000 (other than section 181) shall
text_raw:
3. The Planning and Development Act 2000 (other than section 181) shall 
not apply to the classes of development specified in the Schedule carried out 
by, or on behalf of, a State authority during the relevant period. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 19th May, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [243] 3 

Schedule 

Classes of development to which Planning and Development Act 2000 (other 
than section 181) shall not apply: 

temporary weather radar station by or on behalf of the Minister for Housing, 
Local Government and Heritage 

GIVEN under my Hand, 

16 May, 2023. 

KIERAN O’DONNELL, 

Minister of State at the Department of Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [243]

title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This regulation enables the installation of a temporary weather radar station on 
behalf of the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage during the 
relevant period in the interest of public safety for the accurate reporting of 
national meteorological information by Met Éireann. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [243] 5
